TopicTitle: Help me hire some Kerbals for a BTSM playthrough

Articles.Content:
I've just finished a virgin playthrough of the mod Better Than Starting Manned. It can be best described as career hardmode with a lot more gaming and progression, you'll have to fight for every drop of science.

The mod is still in development and after KSP .23.5 was released the early game under went some overhaul with changes to the tech tree and new starting parts. I'm going to be starting a new playthrough and I need to hire some kerbals because Jeb, Bob and Bill live in my original .22 playthrough. You can help but voting on which kerbals will join my team - I'll be hiring the top 3 candidates. Of course that means they'll be flying the most dangerous early missions, but I'm going to be trying extra hard this time to keep my kerbals alive. I'm going to set it as a personal goal to try and get through this while hiring as few (if any) additional kerbals after the original 3.

These are the kerbals that showed up to apply when I created a fresh save file.
I basically voted for the most courageous one, the one with the highest Stupidity, and the one with the best scores in both.
I voted for Seedous Kerman because of his name and no one else since i missend the "multiple choice" thing
Your post in the mission thread says the poll well be open for 6 days but for some reason it says I may not vote
And suddenly now I can....strange. I blame the internets
It looks like I'll need a kerbal real soon and since Aldrick Kerman is the front runner he just earned his ticket into the space program and will begin training.
